title: Grove music
brief_description: The Grove - better known as London’s Notting Hill Gate district associated with a history of black militancy. But amid the violence has emerged a music which gives expression to the culture and politics of black youth. Bands appearing in this film include: Inity, Aswad, Sons of Jah, Brimstone and Junior Brown.
